citation.article-title: Reclassification of Pseudomonas acidovorans den Dooren de Jong 1926 and Pseudomonas testosteroni Marcus and Talalay 1956 as Comamonas acidovorans comb. nov. and Comamonas testosteroni comb. nov., with an emended description of the genus Comamonas.

p.s: Poly-Î²-hydroxybutyrate is accumulated in cells. The major cellular fatty acids are hexadecanoic acid (16:0), hexadecenoic acid (16:1), and octadecenoic acid (18:1). Cells always contain 3-hydroxydecanoic acid (3-OH 1O:O). The major quinone is Q-8. Menaquinone is not produced. The DNA G+C contents range from 61.0 to 67.1 mol% (as determined by the HPLC method).
